h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Monk from the Sea
content: Take the very first staircase down to a lower platform on the left with a small hut guarded by a Supporter Monk.
promot:

The content is as follows:
Take the very first staircase down to a lower platform on the left with a small hut guarded by a Supporter Monk.
